name: Bribe-Free Zone
title: Lowest Bribery Incidence
description: In 2019, only 0.2% of firms in Lithuania reported experiencing at least one bribe payment request, showcasing the country's commitment to transparency and integrity.

name: Startup Paradise
title: 100% Formal Business Registration
description: As of 2019, every firm in Lithuania was formally registered when operations started, reflecting a robust and supportive business environment.

name: Data Wizards
title: Top Statistical Performance
description: Lithuania achieved a remarkable score of 94.31 in the Statistical Performance Indicators for Pillar 3 data products in 2023, highlighting its excellence in data management and analysis.

name: Education Champions
title: Minimal Male School Dropouts
description: In 2021, only 17 male children of primary school age were out of school, representing just 0.03% of the male primary school age population, indicating strong educational engagement.
